title: International Human Exchange is required for this world.

replies.msg:
Many Leftards love dictatorship countries, especially China. I feel sorry that they were born in democratic countries.
Also, many people that want democracy were born in dictatorship countries.

International Human Exchange (IHE):
Those who live in democratic countries wanting dictatorship can exchange nationality with people in dictatorship countries.

We can also enforce IHE for this case:
A Chinese that is currently working in America said China is better than America, and wanted to go back to China on TV.
There exists a Hongkongese with nearly same professional skill required for same position as that Chinese, who disliked China Communist Party and wanted to travel to America, and submitted an application for IHE.

Consequence:
American officers can interview with that Hongkongese to confirm how he/she loves America.
If success, then cancel the nationality of that Chinese, and give America nationality to that Hongkongese. Properties/Business/Work position owned by that Chinese in America, should also be transferred to that Hongkongese.

In a world of overpopulation, I would propose a more efficient method in handling those who desire communism / socialism, where they can all find place to practice their belief in peace without conflict. Just kill them all, the only place where communism actually works is in heaven
